snippet: Bishop Orlando Findlayter, whose arrest prompted a call from Mayor Bill de Blasio to the police, is at the center of a controversy that has raised questions about the pastor and the mayor’s judgment.
abstract: Bishop Orlando Findlayter, pastor in East Flatbush, Brooklyn, who shares close relationship with Mayor Bill de Blasio, has come under scrutiny for series of financial missteps and for series of run-ins with police; February traffic-related arrest of Findlayter prompted call from de Blasio to police, raising questions about mayor's judgement.
lead_paragraph: Bishop Orlando Findlayter, whose arrest prompted a call from Mayor Bill de Blasio to the police, is at the center of a controversy that has raised questions about the pastor and the mayor’s judgment.

headline.main: After Arrest, Pastor Linked to de Blasio Is Under Scrutiny for Tangled Finances
headline.print_headline: After Arrest, Pastor Linked to Mayor Is Under Scrutiny for Tangled Finances
